===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[hold]]; to [[grasp]]; to [[take]]
# to [[guard]]; to have [[control]] over
#: {{zh-x|把守|to guard; to defend}}
#: {{zh-x|把握|to grasp; to control; to master}}
# {{lb|zh|TCM}} to [[feel]] (for the [[pulse]])
# {{non-gloss definition|A special type of helping verb which, when placed in front of the [[object]] of a sentence, allows for the object of the sentence to be placed before the verb. This allows for greater flexibility in complex sentence construction.}}
#: {{zh-x|他 把 刀 放 在 桌子{zi} 上。|He put the knife on the table.}}
# {{non-gloss definition|used to introduce a “subject + verb + complement” structure}}; to [[cause]] to; to [[make]]
# [[bundle]]; [[bunch]]
# [[handle]]; [[knob]]; [[grip]] (a part of an object which is held in the hand)
# {{zh-classifier|[[object]]s that can be held using [[handle]]s or [[knob]]s, such as [[gun]]s, [[chair]]s, [[broom]]s, [[umbrella]]s}}
#: {{zh-x|三 把 刀|three knives}}
#: {{zh-x|四 把 鉸{gaau3}剪|four pairs of scissors|C}}
#: {{zh-x|兩 '''把''' 掃把|two brooms}}
# {{zh-classifier|[[handful]]s of something, such as [[grain]]s, [[soil]]}}
# {{zh-classifier|[[bundle]]s or [[bunch]]es}}
# {{zh-classifier|some [[abstract]] [[idea]]s, such as [[force]], [[effort]] or [[age]]}}
# {{zh-classifier|something done with the [[hand]]}}
# {{non-gloss definition|placed after numerals or classifiers to express uncertainty}}; [[approximately]]
